name: Explore
overview: Explore is a simple text-based exploration game. It uses a simple text parser with which the player can move around. The game world is divided into multiple levels of a cavern complex. The goal for the player is to find coins and to escape unharmed. From time to time the player will encounter enemies that will bar the player's way. It's up to the player to fight them or to bargain with them. Fighting them will reduce the players vitality, but bargaining will cost the player coins.
